sen.j: 住吉仲皇子（すみのえなかのおうじ、仁徳天皇24年（336年）？ -仁徳天皇87年（399年））は、古墳時代の皇族。
sen.e: Suminoenaka no oji (336? - 399) was a member of the Imperial family who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
Suminoenaka no oji (336? - 399) was a member of the Imperial family who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
Suminoenaka no oji (c. 336 - 399) was a member of the Imperial family who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).

sen.j: 仁徳天皇の皇子で、母は、磐之姫命。
sen.e: He was the Imperial prince of Emperor Nintoku, and his mother was Iwanohime no mikoto.
He was the Imperial prince of Emperor Nintoku, and his mother was Iwanohime no mikoto.
He was the Imperial prince of Emperor Nintoku, and his mother was Iwanohime no mikoto.

sen.j: 仁徳天皇87年（399年）、兄履中天皇の婚約者黒媛を天皇の名をかたって犯してしまい、事の発覚を恐れて、天皇の宮殿を包囲、焼殺しようとするが失敗。
sen.e: In 399, he besieged the Emperor's palace, and tried to kill the Emperor for fear of being found out about pretending to be the Emperor and raping Kurohime who was the fiance of his older brother, Emperor Richu.

In 399, he besieged the Emperor's palace, and tried to kill the Emperor for fear of being found out about pretending to be the Emperor and raping Kurohime who was the fiance of his older brother, Emperor Richu.

In 399, he besieged the Emperor's palace, and tried to kill the Emperor for fear of being found out about pretending to be the Emperor and raping Kurohime who was the fiance of his older brother, Emperor Richu.

sen.j: 天皇に命じられた瑞歯別尊（のちの反正天皇）によって殺された。
sen.e: He was murdered by Mizuhawake no mikoto (the later Emperor Hanzei) by the command of the Emperor.
He was murdered by Mizuhawake no mikoto (the later Emperor Hanzei) by the command of the Emperor.
He was murdered by Mizuhawake no mikoto (the later Emperor Hanzei) by the command of the Emperor.
